title: Ivaraku joochinadhi
sahitya:
Ivaraku jUcinadi cAladA inka nA rItiyA



anupallavi



pAvanamu sEyu shakti kanagani pApamu galadA karivaradA nann-



caraNam 1



shrI sharaNa shugAshana shayana parEsha nI padaku shEshayArcaNamu

     nE sEyaka dUrAsacE bhavapAsha baddhuDai gAsi tALani nann-



caraNam 2



paralOka bhaya virahitulaina narulu nAdupai mari yasUyala baracina 

     bAdhalu taramugAka nI caraNa yugamulanu sharaNoNDina nann-



caraNam 3



nagAsana sadAgamana ghrNAsAgara ninu vinA evaru nIvE 

     gati ani vEvEga moralaniDu tyAgarAjuni rAgarahita nann-
